entities.name: peeves
entities.description: Peeves is a poltergeist who is being targeted by Mr. Filch and is also being addressed by Professor Lupin.

entities.name: filch
entities.description: Filch is the Hogwarts caretaker who is trying to get into his brooms but is unable due to the gum in the keyhole.

entities.name: professor lupin
entities.description: Professor Lupin is a teacher at Hogwarts who is trying to help Peeves and also teaches a class.

entities.name: dean thomas
entities.description: Dean Thomas is a student in Professor Lupin's class who is amazed by the spell used to remove the gum from the keyhole.

relationships.description: Professor Lupin is trying to help Peeves, who is being targeted by Mr. Filch.
Professor Lupin and Filch are on opposite sides in their treatment of Peeves.
Dean Thomas admires the spell used by Professor Lupin to remove the gum from the keyhole.
